name: Pong-tionary
description: Scrabble meets pong. Try to form words by hitting blocks with a ball, some blocks have letters in them. Each level has a random seed that ensures that at least 2 words are possible with the given letters. The game is made using UE4 and 100% of it was done in C++. The game uses the free dictionary api: https://dictionaryapi.dev/ and as such, it requires an internet connection to verify if your words are valid.
